system.basic: You have great business acumen, and whether from your business strategy, good salesmanship or bad-mouthing the competition, your business always does well. Your modifier for Competition is always +1 better than it should be, up to a maximum of +3.
system.advanced: You have the best business mind around. Whenever you gain a dividend from points of Capital you have invested in an outfit you increase your personal bonus by 50%.
